p: In our study, comprehensive oral care intervention could prevent dental caries and increased quality of life in HNC patients. Radiation induced oral side effects are frequent complications and may generate significant impact on HNC patients' long-term and overall QoL. To enable optimal dental care for HNC patients before, during and after radiotherapy, close interdisciplinary communication and cooperation among radiation oncologists, dentists, medical oncologists, and oral surgeons is absolutely essential. Clinicians should be equipped with knowledge about signs and symptoms of oral cavity so that appropriate clinical assessment and timely treatment referral can be made.
